required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase III Study on HMPL-523 for Treatment of ITP
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Phase III Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of HMPL-523 in Treatment of Primary Immune Thrombocytopenia (ITP) in Adults

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized, double blinded, placebo-controlled phase III clinical trial in adult patients with immune thrombocytopenia.

detailed_description.textblock: Approximate 177 patients will be enrolled in study (HMPL-523 2:1 vs Placebo) .

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: the durable response rate in the primary study
primary_outcome.description: Platelet count ≥50×10^9 /L on at least 4 of 6 scheduled visits of Week14-Week24 in the primary study

secondary_outcome.measure: the overall response rate in the primary study
secondary_outcome.time_frame: treatment period Week1-Week24 in the primary study
secondary_outcome.description: At least one platelet count ≥50×10^9 /L (except that induced by the rescue therapy) in the 24-week double-blind treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of treatment emergent adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: treatment period Week1-Week24 in the primary study
secondary_outcome.description: Adverse events classified according to NCI CTCAE version 5.0

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma concentration at steady state 2 hours post dose (C2h,ss)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: treatment period Week1-Week24 in the primary study
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentration of HMPL-523 and its main metabolites at steady state 2 hours post dose (C2h,ss) will be determined.

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma concentration at steady state 2 hours post dose (C4h,ss)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: treatment period Week1-Week24 in the primary study
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentration of HMPL-523 and its main metabolites at steady state 4 hours post dose (C4h,ss) will be determined.

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma concentration at steady-state trough concentration (Cmin,ss)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: treatment period Week1-Week24 in the primary study
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentration of HMPL-523 and its main metabolites at steady-state trough concentration (Cmin,ss) will be determined.

arm_group.description: Eligible subjects will be treated with planned dose of 300 mg HMPL-523 once daily for 24 weeks
Drug: Placebo HMPL-523 matching placebo will be oral administrated once daily for 24 weeks.

intervention.description: HMPL-523 will be oral administrated once daily for 24 weeks
HMPL-523 matching placebo will be oral administrated once daily for 24 weeks .
